full_summary:
### Heavy Equipment Rental with Operator - Cape Breton Highlands National Park

**Tender Details:**

* **Solicitation Number:** 5P300-22-0004/A
* **Publication Date:** 2022-10-21
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-15T13:00:00
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

### Business Opportunity:

Parks Canada invites Canadian businesses to submit a Standing Offer for the rental of heavy equipment with operators for two locations at Cape Breton National Park:

*   **Cape Breton Highlands (Ingonish):** includes all areas of the Cape Breton Highlands from the Ingonish Park Entrance to the staff house in Big Interval
*   **Cape Breton Highlands (Cheticamp):** includes all areas of the Cape Breton Highlands from the Cheticamp Park Entrance up to but not including the staff house in Big Interval, also includes Cheticamp Island

**Contract Duration:**

*   The Standing Offer is valid from Award to October 31, 2023
*   The Standing Offer may be extended by 2 one-year periods, subject to the contractor's agreement

**Submission Requirements:**

*    Bids must be received via fax or email
*    Bids submitted in person or by courier will not be accepted
*    The only accepted email address is: [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca)
*    The only acceptable facsimile for responses to bid solicitations is: 1-877-558-2349
*    Bid documents must be sent as email attachments

**Quoting and Sourcing:**

*   National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act
*   Enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and received at least five (5) business days prior to the tender closing date
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language
